subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, who finished 12 shots off the lead at the British Open, said he’d rather “wait for a year of nice weather” than change his game for a stormy course.
snippet: Rory McIlroy, who finished 12 shots off the lead at the British Open, said he’d rather “wait for a year of nice weather” than change his game for a stormy course.
